explanation: [0-0] In a bright kitchen, a man wearing a pink hat and green sportswear is sitting at a table with a woman wearing a Mickey Mouse T-shirt. They each have a plate of noodles in front of them, and the man is eating his noodles with a fork. There are also two bottles of seasoning on the table.

[0-8] The woman points to the man and makes a funny face, prompting him to look to the left. While he's distracted, she grabs the salt shaker and pours a lot of salt into his noodles. When the man turns back, the woman smiles gleefully, while he looks at her with a straight face. Then, the man tells her to look to the right, and while she does, he picks up the salt shaker and starts pouring salt into her noodles. The woman, still smiling happily, is completely unaware. Next, the woman sends the man away, and he walks to the other side of the kitchen.
